recomend_1: for use with all kinds of ready meals.
desc_1: The spice is rich in antioxidants, dietary fiber and trace elements. By improving the choleretic function and the function of the pancreas, spice improves the process of food evacuation, as a result of which it ensures the absorption of nutrients contained in food and improves bowel movement. Regular use of "YAYRATAN" improves intestinal microflora and normalizes cholesterol levels.
glink_1: Glycemic index - 12%, amount dietary fiber in 100 g of the product - 11 g.
notRecomend_1: Not recommended for children under 3 years old.
desc_2:
The content of proteins, fats and carbohydrates in cookies are balanced. It is rich in micronutrients, including organic iodine, which is easily absorbed by the body.
The presence of the amino acid tryptophan helps to improve mood and the manifestation of antidepressant properties. Due to the sufficient amount of dietary fiber in the composition, it improves the intestinal microflora.
With regular use, it eliminates iodine deficiency conditions, prevents a drop in body temperature in children.
recomend_2: for use by all age categories, including children from 1 year old.
glink_2: The main thing is that organic iodine is present in the product in its natural biological state, therefore an overdose of iodine in the body is excluded.
desc_3: Improves the process of digestion in the gastrointestinal tract, prevents obesity, promotes the removal of toxins from the intestines.
recomend_3: for diabetes, cardiovascular diseases, allergies, obesity, potassium and calcium deficiency, constipation.
glink_3: Glycemic index - 45.1%,the amount of dietary fiber in 100 g of the product is 4.3 g.
